posts.post_content:
Still trying for a CHOP set of T206 Molesworth and Perdue. Please PM or [URL="mailto:email.jasonstricker@gmail.com"]email[/URL]me if you can assist with a T213-1 version of any of these. Beaters are fine! Thanks.

I don't believe Revelle can be found with T213-1 version, but I could be wrong. If I'm wrong, then I'm interested in one. :)

Jason,

Perhaps, you should swing for the fences and put together a CHOORP set.

Coupon-Hindu-OldMill(t206)-OldMill(T210)-Red Sun(T211)-Piedmont.  

Good Luck with CHOP !  (The Perdue Coupon Type 1 will take a long time. I have only seen one in the last 15 years)
